Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2010 01:04AM CV9 wrote: Hi CHWES, my mom started chemo in august (i'm only joining this site now)- was wondering how you're getting on looking after her? I'm definitely doing the shopping / errand running part of it - although I can't cook at all!  Hope you're coping well yourself and your mom is doing fine with chemo. I know how hard it must be for both of you.
Posts.Title: Caring for a chemo patient CHWES CV9
